hints.content:
The number line shows $\maroonD{8}$ equal jumps of $\blueD{10}$ units.

![The same number line with each arrow labeled, plus 10](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ab21f026a36400ed43d6a4fa6a1196b313de585e)

options.explanation:
$\maroonD{8}\times\blueD{10}=\maroonD{8}\blueD{\text{ tens}}$.

That's the same as $\maroonD{4}\blueD{\text{ tens}}+\maroonD{4}\blueD{\text{ tens}}$.

![The same number line with a brace spanning the first 4 arrows labeled, 4 tens, and a brace spanning the other 4 arrows labeled, 4 tens](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f54050ba5304e37f01b5e532a96094213c855954)

$\redD{40}+\purpleC{40}=\greenD{80}$

So $\maroonD{8}\times\blueD{10}=\greenD{80}$.
